languages.text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} has not moved this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} more damage with {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks for every 5 cells between them and the target and gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill} Ballistic Skill{/g}. These bonuses do not stack and last until the Operative moves.
languages.original_text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} не двигается в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, он получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} к урону от атак {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночными{/g} выстрелами за каждые 5 клеток расстояния до цели.

traits.locale_text: If the Adept has not moved this turn, they gain +<u>(PER bonus)</u> Ballistic Skill and +<u>(INT bonus)/2</u> damage for every 5 cells between them and the target.

If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} has not moved this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} more damage with {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks for every 5 cells between them and the target and gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill} Ballistic Skill{/g}. These bonuses do not stack and last until the Operative moves.

If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} has not moved this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} more damage with {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks for every 5 cells between them and the target and gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill} Ballistic Skill{/g}. These bonuses do not stack and last until the Operative moves.

languages.text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} не двигается в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, он получает +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} к урону от атак {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночными{/g} выстрелами за каждые 5 клеток расстояния до цели, а также +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}. Эти бонусы не суммируются и действуют, пока оперативник не подвигается.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} has not moved this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} for every 5 cells between them and the target.

traits.locale_text: Если адепт не двигается в свой ход, он получает +<u>бонус ВОС</u> к Дальнему Бою и +<u>(бонус ИНТ / 2)</u> к урону за каждые 5 клеток расстояния до цели.
Если адепт не двигается в свой ход, он получает +<u>бонус ВОС</u> к Дальнему Бою и +<u>(бонус ИНТ / 2)</u> к урону за каждые 5 клеток расстояния до цели.

Если адепт не двигается в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, он получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} к урону за каждые 5 клеток расстояния до цели.

languages.text: 如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}未移动过，则{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}点。当特工使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}攻击敌人时，与敌人之间每相距5格，此次攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188}点。
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} has not moved this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks for every 5 cells between them and the target.

traits.locale_text: 如果技师本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}未移动过，则会获得{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}加成，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。当技师攻击敌人时，与敌人之间每相距5格，此次攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}都会造成额外伤害，等同于<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}加值/2）</u>。

如果技师本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}未移动过，则会获得{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}加成，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}。当技师攻击敌人时，与敌人之间每相距5格，此次攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}都会造成额外伤害，等同于{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188}。

languages.text: Si el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} no se ha movido este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a sus ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} por cada 5 casillas que le separen del objetivo.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} has not moved this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks for every 5 cells between them and the target.

traits.locale_text: Si el agente no se ha movido este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por cada 5 casillas que le separen del objetivo.

Si el adepto no se ha movido este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} de {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} por cada 5 casillas que le separen del objetivo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}がこの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に移動していない場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}増加し、ターゲットとの間が5マス離れるごとに{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188}増加する。
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} has not moved this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} more damage with {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks for every 5 cells between them and the target and gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill} Ballistic Skill{/g}. These bonuses do not stack and last until the Operative moves.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}がこの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に移動していない場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}増加し、ターゲットとの間が5マス離れるごとに{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188}増加する。
アデプトがこの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に移動していない場合、{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}増加し、ターゲットとの間が5マス離れるごとに{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188}増加する。

languages.text: Wenn sich der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agent{/g} in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nicht bewegt hat, erlangt er +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} und +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} Schaden bei {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriffen für alle 5 Felder zwischen ihm und dem Ziel.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} has not moved this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} damage on {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks for every 5 cells between them and the target.

traits.locale_text: Wenn sich der Agent in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nicht bewegt hat, erlangt er +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} und +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} für alle 5 Felder zwischen ihm und dem Ziel.

Wenn sich der Adept in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nicht bewegt hat, erlangt er +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} and +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g} für alle 5 Felder zwischen ihm und dem Ziel.

languages.text: Si l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Opérateur{/g} ne s'est pas déplacé pendant ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g} et +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} par tranche de 5 cases qui le sépare de la cible pour les attaques au {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}coup par coup{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} has not moved this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks for every 5 cells between them and the target.

traits.locale_text: Si l'Adepte ne s'est pas déplacé pendant ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il bénéficie de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g} et de +<u>(bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} / 2)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} par tranche de 5 cases qui le sépare de la cible.

Si l'Adepte ne s'est pas déplacé pendant ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g} et de +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} points de {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} par tranche de 5 cases qui le sépare de la cible.
